Trigger: It is 7:00 a.m. AND Mode is Home
Action: Set Coffee Maker switch on AND Set Shades/Blinds windowShade open
Schedule: Scheduled-time (e.g. |  brew coffee at 7 am)

Trigger: Mode is Away
Action: Set Fan switch off AND set Lighting Remote switch off AND set Security Camera switch on AND set Door Lock lock lock AND set Garage Door Opener door close
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: Mode is Away AND Motion Sensor motion is detected
Action: Set Security Alarm alarm setAlarmMode Siren AND set Security Camera image take
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: Water Leak Detector water is wet
Action: Set Valve valve close
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: Gas Sensor odorLevel is 10
Action: Set Gas Sensor alarm setAlarmMode Siren
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: Garage Door Opener door is open
Action: Set Door Lock lock unlock
Schedule: Manually-triggered (e.g. |  a button press)

Trigger: Mode is Away AND Time is 1:00pm
Action: Set Robot Vacuum switch on
Schedule: Scheduled-time (e.g. |  brew coffee at 7 am)

Trigger: Presence Sensor presence is not nearby for 5 consecutive minutes
Action: Set Smart TV switch off
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: Mode is Vacation AND Time is 6:00 p.m.
Action: Set Lighting Remote switch on
Schedule: Scheduled-time (e.g. |  brew coffee at 7 am)

Trigger: Time is 9:00 p.m.
Action: Set Lighting Remote setColor yellow
Schedule: Scheduled-time (e.g. |  brew coffee at 7 am)

Trigger: Mode is Vacation AND Time is 11:00 p.m.
Action: Set Lighting Remote switch off
Schedule: Scheduled-time (e.g. |  brew coffee at 7 am)

Trigger: Time is 8:00 p.m.
Action: Set Shades/Blinds windowShade close
Schedule: Scheduled-time (e.g. |  brew coffee at 7 am)

Trigger: mode is set to Away
Action: lock door AND set Security_Alarm to both AND turn off Air_Conditioner AND turn off Gas_Stove AND close Garage_Door
Schedule: Manually-triggered (e.g. |  a button press)

Trigger: Glass_Break_Detector detects a shock OR Motion_Sensor detects motion
Action: set Security_Alarm to both AND dial 911 on Phone
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: Glass_Break_Detector detects a shock OR Motion_Sensor detects motion
Action: set Security_Alarm to both AND dial 911 on Phone
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: Gas_Sensor_odorLevel is unsafe OR Smoke_Detector detects smoke
Action: dial 911 on Phone AND set Gas_Sensor_alarm to strobe
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: Gas_Sensor_odorLevel is unsafe OR Smoke_Detector detects smoke
Action: dial 911 on Phone AND set Gas_Sensor_alarm to strobe
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: Smart_TV is on AND Smart_TV_inputSource is set to Bluray_Player
Action: turn off Lighting AND turn on AV_Receiver AND set AV_Reveiver_inputSource to Bluray
Schedule: Manually-triggered (e.g. |  a button press)

Trigger: mode is set to Night
Action: set Thermostat_coolingSetpoint to 63 AND set Lighting_Remote_switch to off AND set Dishwasher_Mode to auto
Schedule: Manually-triggered (e.g. |  a button press)

Trigger: time is 8:00AM AND time is Monday through Friday
Action: activate alarm AND set Lighting_Remote_switch to on AND play weather information over Bedroom_Speaker AND set Thermostat_heatingSetpoint to 72
Schedule: Scheduled-time (e.g. |  brew coffee at 7 am)

Trigger: mode is Home AND weather is below 20
Action: set Thermostat_heatingSetpoint to 80
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: Phone is within 1000ft of home
Action: set Door_Lock to unlocked AND set Thermostat_heatingSetpoint to 72 AND set Lighting_Remote_switch to on
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: mode is Home AND weather is above 80
Action: set Thermostat_switch to off AND set Air_Conditioner_switch to on AND set Air_Conditioner_mode to cool
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: mode is Home AND time is 6:00PM
Action: set Speaker_switch to on AND set Speaker to playPlaylist 'Dinner' AND set Gas_Stove_switch to on
Schedule: Scheduled-time (e.g. |  brew coffee at 7 am)

Trigger: home and temperature is > 75
Action: Turn on the Air Conditioner
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: home and Doorbell rings
Action: Turn on Security Camera
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: time is between 7 am and 9am
Action: Turn on shades
Schedule: Scheduled-time (e.g. |  brew coffee at 7 am)

Trigger: away and CO detector detects high CO amount in air
Action: Sound Security Alarm
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: away and detected Smoke
Action: Sound Security Alarm
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: away
Action: lock door
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: If living room detected motion
Action: Turn on the light
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: if bedroom open/close sensor status is open
Action: Turn on the security camera
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: home
Action: unlock door
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: home and temperature is < 65
Action: Turn on the heater
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: TV is on AND the sun has set
Action: close the shades/blinds AND turn off Living_Room_Light
Schedule: Manually-triggered (e.g. |  a button press) | Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: Smart Home mode is set to Away
Action: turn off the fan AND turn off all lights AND close the shades/blinds AND turn off the TV
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: it is midnight
Action: turn on the humidifier
Schedule: Scheduled-time (e.g. |  brew coffee at 7 am)

Trigger: TV is playing movie AND it is past 7:00 PM
Action: set the thermostat to 70 degrees (F) AND turn off Living_Room_Light AND turn on Living_Room_Humidifier AND close the shades/blinds AND turn on Living_Room_Fan
Schedule: Scheduled-time (e.g. |  brew coffee at 7 am) | Manually-triggered (e.g. |  a button press)

Trigger: Temperature Sensor reports Living_Room_Temp > 70 F
Action: turn on Living_Room_Fan
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: doorbell is rung
Action: turn on Front_Porch_Security_Camera
Schedule: Manually-triggered (e.g. |  a button press)

Trigger: Microwave Oven has been on heat > 100 F for over 3 hours
Action: Prompt user to turn Microwave Oven off or keep it on
Schedule: Scheduled-time (e.g. |  brew coffee at 7 am) | Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: it is 8:00 AM
Action: open Living_Room_Shades_and_Blinds
Schedule: Scheduled-time (e.g. |  brew coffee at 7 am)

Trigger: Door Lock is set to Lock AND it is past 8:00 PM
Action: close Living_Room_Shades_and_Blinds AND turn on outside Security Camera(s)
Schedule: Scheduled-time (e.g. |  brew coffee at 7 am) | Manually-triggered (e.g. |  a button press)

Trigger: Smoke is detected by Smoke Detector AND the value of Temperature Sensor is bigger than 200 Celcius
Action: Switch Sprinkler on AND unlock Door Lock AND Switch Off Gas Stove AND Close the Valve
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: It is 8am AND the value of Sleep Monitor is not sleeping
Action: Switch on the Bread Maker AND switch on the Kettle AND switch on the Coffee Maker and switch on the Rice cooker
Schedule: Scheduled-time (e.g. |  brew coffee at 7 am)

Trigger: The value of Glass Break Detector is Shock AND the value of Sleep Monitor is Sleeping
Action: switch on Security Camera AND take image of Security AND setAlarmMode of Security Alarm to Siren
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: fineDustLevel of Dust detector is bigger than 300ug/m^3 OR DustLevel of Dust Detector is bigger than 250 ug/m^3
Action: Turn the Robot Vacuum On and set the Robot Vacuum robotCleanerCleaningMode to be Auto and set the robotCleanerTurboMode of Robot Vacuum to be silent
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: If Doorbell is on AND DoorLock is unlocked
Action: Lock the DoorLock AND switch on Security Camera AND take image of Security
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: The value of carbonMonoxide detected by CO Detector is bigger than 70 ppm AND the CO Detector is NOT Tampered AND the odorLevel of Gas Sensor is above average
Action: switch on the Fan AND Unlock the DoorLock AND Switch on Security Alarm
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: The Value of Mode is Away
Action: Switch off Microwave Oven AND Lock the DoorLock AND Close the Garage Door Opener AND  Switch off Gas Stove AND Switch off induction cooktop AND switch on security camera
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: The Value of Mode is Kids
Action: Switch off Microwave Oven AND Switch off Gas Stove AND Switch off induction cooktop AND switch ON smart TV AND set the value of tvChannel on Smart TV to be kids' channels
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: Temperature of thermostat is higher than 24 Celsius Or the Temperature of thermostat is lower than 18 Celsius
Action: switch on air conditioner AND set the temperature level of air conditioner to be 22 Celsius
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: pressure of Blood Pressure monitor is lower than average or pressure of blood pressure monitor is higher than average or pulse of pulse monitor is lower than average or pulse of pulse monitor is higher than average
Action: set tvChannel  of smart TV to be health channel
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: pressure of Blood Pressure monitor is lower than average or pressure of blood pressure monitor is higher than average or pulse of pulse monitor is lower than average or pulse of pulse monitor is higher than average
Action: set tvChannel  of smart TV to be health channel
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: pressure of Blood Pressure monitor is lower than average or pressure of blood pressure monitor is higher than average or pulse of pulse monitor is lower than average or pulse of pulse monitor is higher than average
Action: set tvChannel  of smart TV to be health channel
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)

Trigger: pressure of Blood Pressure monitor is lower than average or pressure of blood pressure monitor is higher than average or pulse of pulse monitor is lower than average or pulse of pulse monitor is higher than average
Action: set tvChannel  of smart TV to be health channel
Schedule: Executed at random (e.g. |  every time I enter the room)
